div.h1: Welcome to DeKalb County Eastern Community School District

div.p: At DeKalb Eastern Schools, we expect all of our students to pass state tests, graduate with a diploma and become a successful applicant for college or the workplace.

img.alt: Best High Schools US News - Bronze

p.img: At DeKalb Eastern Schools, we expect all of our students to pass state tests, graduate with a diploma and become a successful applicant for college or the workplace.

div.p: It is the policy of the DeKalb County Eastern Community School District not to discriminate in the educational programming or activities which it maintains.
